trans-unit.source: Hosts a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] window as an element within [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: Ospita un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] finestra come elemento all'interno di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] contenuto.

trans-unit.source: To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window, create a class that derives from HwndHost.
trans-unit.target: Per ospitare un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] finestra, creare una classe che deriva da HwndHost.

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore%2A> method and create your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window as a child of the parent window that is passed into the method.
trans-unit.target: Eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore%2A>(metodo) e creare il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] finestra come elemento figlio della finestra padre che viene passato al metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost.BuildWindowCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Although HwndHost derives from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, various properties of HwndHost that come from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and other intermediate classes such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> are not generally mapped to possible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] equivalents.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > HwndHost Sebbene deriva da <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, diverse proprietà di HwndHost che provengono da <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>e altre classi intermedie, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>non sono in genere mappati a possibili [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] equivalenti.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: Also, not all <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> / <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> input events transfer across the interoperation boundary.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, non tutti <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>/ <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>trasferimento degli eventi di input nel limite dell'interazione.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: HwndHost derives from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> primarily so that an HwndHost instance can be inserted into the widest variety of possible content models, and so that default <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> layout characteristics can apply.
trans-unit.target: HwndHost deriva da <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>principalmente in modo che un'istanza di HwndHost è possibile inserire in una varietà di possibili modelli di contenuto e, in modo che predefinito <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>possono applicare le caratteristiche di layout.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: For more details on HwndHost, see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su HwndHost, vedere [interoperatività di WPF e Win32](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> Questo tipo o membro non è disponibile nell'area di sicurezza di Internet.
